1.title: To Spoon or Not to Spoon

episode of.title: Nick Stellino: Storyteller in the Kitchen (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Chef Stellino shares the story of his most favorite utensil - a large metal spoon. Dishes include: Tortellini ala Panna (tortellini in a cream sauce) / Pasta Alle Vongole All'Esenziale (Spaghetti with Clams) / Chicken Scallopini / Apple Tart.

2.title: Being Italian

episode of.title: Nick Stellino: Storyteller in the Kitchen (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Chef Stellino explains the difference between Italians from Italy and Italian Americans. Dishes include: Salsiccie al Sugo (sausages braised in tomato sauce ) / Pasta alla Nanci (with Ricotta cheese) / Pasta with Shrimp (Linguine and Shrimp in white wine) / Sicilian Fish Soup / Pannacotta (chocolate pudding with berries and mint).

3.title: The Gardener

episode of.title: Nick Stellino: Storyteller in the Kitchen (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Chef Stellino digs into his family's history of farming in Italy and how tending to a garden is like tending to a family. Dishes include: Lenticchie Brasate (Braised lentils) / Cavoli Arriminati (Mixed up Cauliflower) / Pasta Con Le Zucchine (Pasta with Zucchini in a butter sauce)

4.title: The Food Artist

episode of.title: Nick Stellino: Storyteller in the Kitchen (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Chef Stellino paints the picture of a life expressing himself through his plating. Dishes include: Red Wine Sauce / Scalloped Potatoes (with Swiss and Parmesan cheese) / Steak au Poivre with Garlic Arugula / Salmon with Brussel Sprouts and Red Wine Sauce.

5.title: I Love Cheese

episode of.title: Nick Stellino: Storyteller in the Kitchen (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Chef Stellino explains his love for cheese and how it reminds him of memories growing up. Dishes include: Pasta Alla Norma (Pasta with fried eggplant) / Rollatini di Melanzane (Grilled eggplant with ricotta filling) / Ricotta pudding.

6.title: Food Memories

episode of.title: Nick Stellino: Storyteller in the Kitchen (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: Chef Stellino shares how the food he prepares links him to his past, present and future. Dishes include: Salsiccie e Fagioli (Sausage and beans) / Orecchiette Con Broccoli e Salsiccia ( Orecchiette Pasta with Broccoli and Sausage) / Insalata a la Siciliana (a Sicilian salad with fennel, endive, red onion, oranges, olives, and white balsamic vinegar).

7.title: Bacon or Pancetta

episode of.title: Nick Stellino: Storyteller in the Kitchen (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: Chef Stellino attempts to answer the age old question - which is better - bacon or pancetta? Dishes include: Ragu' Di Gamberetti (Shrimp, Bacon, Asparagus and Red Peppers) / Shrimp Amatriciana with Pasta (shrimp, pasta and pancetta) / Insalata Del Sogno (a salad with pancetta, parmesan cheese, vinaigrette dressing) / Watermelon Salad with Tomato and Bacon.

8.title: Family Matters

episode of.title: Nick Stellino: Storyteller in the Kitchen (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: Chef Stellino recalls the charming quirks of his family in Italy and America. Dishes Include: Pasta All' Arrabbiata (Pasta with a spicy tomato sauce) / Salsicce Brasate con Broccoli e Peperoni (Braised sausages with broccoli and peppers) / Banana Cream Pudding.

9.title: The Tomato Whisperer

episode of.title: Nick Stellino: Storyteller in the Kitchen (TV Series 2017– )

9.plot: Chef Stellino explores the complexities of the tomato. Dishes include: Tomato Salad (Cherry tomatoes with mozzarella and onions) / Tonno alla Puttanesca (Tuna steaks with a special tomato sauce) / Blueberry Crumble.

10.title: A Dish to Name

episode of.title: Nick Stellino: Storyteller in the Kitchen (TV Series 2017– )

10.plot: Chef Stellino explores how to properly make and name a dish for someone special. Dishes Include: Maureen's Farro Salad / Gambero al Coccio (Shrimp in the shell cooked in wine) / Grandma's Braciole /Aunt Buliti's Strawberries ( a special twist on a fresh fruit cup featuring strawberries and oranges with a very special sauce).

11.title: The Great Outdoorsman

episode of.title: Nick Stellino: Storyteller in the Kitchen (TV Series 2017– )

11.plot: Chef Stellino recalls the joys of camping, or lack therof. Dishes include: Pollo Alla Cacciatore (Chicken Cacciatore) / Pork Chop Alla Milanese / Macedonia Di Frutta (Marinated fruit salad in liquor and sugar).

12.title: The Heart of the Artichoke

episode of.title: Nick Stellino: Storyteller in the Kitchen (TV Series 2017– )

12.plot: Chef Stellino explores the history, traditions and uses of the artichoke. Dishes include: Salsiccia Brasate con Carciofi (Braised sausages with Artichokes) / Pasta con Carciofi e Prosciutto Cotto (Pasta with artichokes and cooked ham) / Braised Artichokes and Peppers / Fragole Ubriache (Tipsy Strawberries).

13.title: Vincenzo

episode of.title: Nick Stellino: Storyteller in the Kitchen (TV Series 2017– )

13.plot: Chef Stellino shares the story of how his father's dream became his reality as he prepares Vincenzo's favorite dishes, including:: Mussels with Garlic and Ginger / Swordfish with Peas and Tomato Sauce / Gelo Di Melone (Watermelon pudding).

imdb.plot outline: For the first time, chef Nick Stellino invites viewers into his home to experience the recipes nearest to his heart in the 13-part series NICK STELLINO: STORYTELLER IN THE KITCHEN. Throughout the program, Nick travels down memory lane to revisit dishes inspired by his childhood and family in Sicily. He demonstrates step-by-step instructions and easy-to-follow techniques, bringing Italian classics to life in a way that allows viewers to prepare new chapters in their own culinary experience.
imdb.title: Nick Stellino: Storyteller in the Kitchen
akas: Nick Stellino: Storyteller in the Kitchen (United States)
plot: For the first time, chef Nick Stellino invites viewers into his home to experience the recipes nearest to his heart in the 13-part series NICK STELLINO: STORYTELLER IN THE KITCHEN. Throughout the program, Nick travels down memory lane to revisit dishes inspired by his childhood and family in Sicily. He demonstrates step-by-step instructions and easy-to-follow techniques, bringing Italian classics to life in a way that allows viewers to prepare new chapters in their own culinary experience.
